title: Lamb, tomato and anchovy casserole with cumin aubergines

ingredients.item: 2 medium aubergines, trimmed, halved and sliced
Soured cream and chopped fresh parsley to serve

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Toss the aubergine with the cumin and seasoning. Heat ½ the oil in a flameproof casserole and cook the aubergine in batches until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.

Heat the remaining oil in the casserole and brown the lamb really well on all sides. Remove with a slotted spoon. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for 5 minutes until soft and golden. Return the lamb to the pan with any juices and add the anchovies, aubergines, tomatoes, olives, lemon juice and seasoning. Add about 150ml water, bring to the boil then cover and place in the oven for 1½ -1¾ hours until the lamb is tender and sauce reduced. Check seasoning.
Scatter with chopped parsley and serve with soured cream on the side, baked potatoes and a green salad.
